zone.line: Ascend beside me, veiled in the light 35
Of the desire which makes thee one with me
Image
Thetis, bright Shadow of Eternity—
When thou didst cry — "Insufferable might
God! spare me! I sustain not the quick
flames ,
being
The penetrating presence, all my frame
Like him whom the Numidian seps did thaw
Into a dew with poison, is dissolved—
Sinking thro its foundations"— Even then
Two mighty spirits mingling made a third
Mightier than either — th which unbodied now
Which
felt al though unbeheld
Between us, floats, our mighty Progeny
Waiting the incarnation, which ascends—
wheels
Hear ye the thunder of the fiery winds
Griding the winds? from Demogorgon's throne—
Victory,! Victory!; feel'st thou not o World 50
The Earthquake of his chariot thundering
up
Olympus?
The Car of the Hour arrives, Demogorgon
descends & moves toward the throne of Jupiter.
